trans-unit.source: Use the procedure that matches your backend project type—either [.NET backend](#dotnet) or [Node.js backend](#nodejs).
trans-unit.target: Use the procedure that matches your backend project type—either [.NET backend](#dotnet) or [Node.js backend](#nodejs).

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, right-click the server project and click **Manage NuGet Packages**, search for `Microsoft.Azure.NotificationHubs`, then click **Install**.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, right-click the server project and click **Manage NuGet Packages**, search for `Microsoft.Azure.NotificationHubs`, then click **Install**.

trans-unit.source: This installs the Notification Hubs library for sending notifications from your backend.
trans-unit.target: This installs the Notification Hubs library for sending notifications from your backend.

trans-unit.source: In the server project, open **Controllers** > **TodoItemController.cs**, and add the following using statements:
trans-unit.target: In the server project, open **Controllers** > **TodoItemController.cs**, and add the following using statements:

trans-unit.source: In the **PostTodoItem** method, add the following code after the call to **InsertAsync**:
trans-unit.target: In the **PostTodoItem** method, add the following code after the call to **InsertAsync**:

trans-unit.source: This code tells the notification hub to send a a template notification to all template registrations that contain "messageParam".
trans-unit.target: This code tells the notification hub to send a a template notification to all template registrations that contain "messageParam".

trans-unit.source: The string will be inserted in the place of messageParam across each PNS that has a registration using "messageParam".
trans-unit.target: The string will be inserted in the place of messageParam across each PNS that has a registration using "messageParam".

trans-unit.source: This allows you to send the notification to APNS, GCM, WNS, or any other PNS.
trans-unit.target: This allows you to send the notification to APNS, GCM, WNS, or any other PNS.

trans-unit.source: For more information on templates with Notification Hubs, see [Templates](notification-hubs-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on templates with Notification Hubs, see [Templates](notification-hubs-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: Replace the existing code in the todoitem.js file with the following:
trans-unit.target: Replace the existing code in the todoitem.js file with the following:

trans-unit.source: This sends a template notification that contains the item.text when a new todo item is inserted.
trans-unit.target: This sends a template notification that contains the item.text when a new todo item is inserted.

trans-unit.source: When editing the file in your local computer, republish the server project.
trans-unit.target: When editing the file in your local computer, republish the server project.
